title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Belichick hits the beach during free agency; Giants embarrassing OBJ deal; Le'Veon lost; Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Belichick hits the beach during free agency; Giants embarrassing OBJ deal; Le'Veon lost; Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff looks at Belichick spending free agency on the beach in Barbados, gives his reaction to the Odell Beckham trade and Le'Veon Bell signing with the Jets, and answers questions in a massive Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
